author: Matthew Panzarino
title: Ooni’s Koda 16 pizza oven is the rare kitchen gadget that delivers on its promise
description: Ooni (nee Uuni), has been around for a few years now, but its latest oven, the Koda 16, launched in March. At the top of my list was learning how to make decent pizza at home (we don’t have many decent pizzaiolo’s in my town). After a couple of pizza launchin…
content:
Ooni (nee Uuni), has been around for a few years now, but its latest oven, the Koda 16, launched in March. Just like everyone else, Ive been cooped up at home for weeks with nothing but all of the projects I would get around to one day.
At the top of my list… [+7345 chars]
